Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Kinzie.
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Ferdinand, Hamlin, Washington, and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Kinzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Ferdinand, Hamlin, Washington, and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Kinzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at 47th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at 47th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
